description: This file is a shell script that provides functions for managing OCI containers through JSON-RPC calls to a local service. It includes commands to start, stop, list, get info, pause, resume containers, and execute commands inside containers, as well as a command-line interactive interface.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts an OCI container from a specified bundle directory or tarball.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container identified by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container with optional options.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information for the OCI container commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main interactive loop for the container management tool.
